Kevin Carpet Stories:

I got the ok to do my carpet thing at this rock bar...This was the first time I ever went there....The owner said the promoter of the night said great after he called him on the phone...

I got there by 7pm..bands started at 8..I set up by the bar...The bartender wrote a large note on a piece of paper that read..

"STEP,DANCE,JUMP ON CARPET" I wore my goggles and got down and was ready to go..

The 1st band was a band with 3 girl memebers..They saw me and the sign and after their practice they went to get a drink,but they all stepped around me..The bartender was real cool he tells them.."Go ahead step on him its fun"..and they at first lightly got on me..then after a bit they were bouncing....They were cute girls 2 had heels on one wore flat boots...They thanked me after their friend took some pics they left..

By 9pm I had 3 girls standing and jumping on me after the bartender told them if they jumped on me for a bit they would get free shots...lol

A differnt girl stood on my upper chest as her boyfriend was siiting on a stool by me and they were chatting then her other girlfriend joined her...Both girls wore winter type furry boots....

When the promoter came he saw me there and saw the girls having fun and told the manager he didnt want this here...

The manager come over to me and got the girls off and said he was sorry but the promoter didnt want this at his event..even after he said yes on the phone..The manager told me to come back again next week.(he saw all the girls ahving fun on me)..I thanked him and left...

I only had 2 carpets that I found on the street with me....(took a few hours of block searching to even find them ..(my good 2 set of carpets are home)

So I was carrying these light carpets (not as good as my other ones these moved and kept unraviling) I was in the east villiage anyway..and it was only 1am....I tried a few bars and nothing..then after I was going to throw away the carpet at a certain block and take a cab home...I went in this bar and it was pretty crowded..I had 4 movie tickets left on me after giving the other bartender a few for his great help..I asked the bartender if I can roll up in front of her bar..Told her what I was doing that night and told her I'd give her a few passess to see movies...She said yes...

I made room by the bar and got under..At this bar I had the luck of being by these girls having a small party there was 7 of them ...They saw me and asked the bartedner what I was doing there..She told them they could stand on me...3 of them did..they wore sneakers (east villiage attire) then 1 other girl had her boot resting on my shoulder....After awhile the girls felt more comfortable moving around going off to smoke or bathroom and just walking right back on..it was nice...Plus I guess they loved to be taller...

They left a little after 3 I think cause the bar was starting to get empty..
I got up thanked the bartender..gave her 4 passeess..she told me I could come back..And I told her I would bring her more tickets..She said that wasnt nessarsary..I said I would anyway thanked her again and left..

The cute blonde bartender never went on me, after I got up and thanked her I looked behind the bar and she wore these cool pink new Rock boots..Damn

He knew he was way too drunk to drive. In fact he could barely walk. At an opportune moment he broke away from the others hoping he could make it home before he passed out. He took the short cut along K Street if nothing else the concrete wall that ran along K Street would keep him from stumbling out in traffic. As he went along he thought he would just sit for a moment and gather his head. Pretty soon he was lying up along side the wall flat on his back passed out to the world. 

Ann Potter was a definite looker. She was easily the best looking woman in her office with her dark red hair hanging down her back and trim athletic figure of about 120 lbs. And she dresses to show it off. Today she had on a crisp white blouse and loose flowing colorful skirt that was short in response to the very hot day. She no stockings on her shapely bare legs and on her feet were her usual spike heeled stilettos of about 3” and very thin. Of course today she would have rather chosen different footwear as she was in such a hurry and it was hard to walk fast in her spike heels. She heard that there was going to be a short parade with Brad Pitt in it coming by at a little after five. If she hurried she would just make it. She had worked all day and she was already hot and tired without the need to hurry over to K Street, where she heard the parade was going to be going by.

As she approached K Street she spotted the wall, Christ! She had forgotten about the wall! It ran for over two blocks by the time she got to the end of it, it would surely be too late. But wait, there was a notch cut in the wall just up ahead there. It was like the ramparts on top of a castle wall, she would be able so see through that.

It wasn’t an accident. She wasn’t about to cut him any slack just because he’s drunk. The way she figured it everything that happened to him was his own fault and she wouldn’t lift a little finger to help him out or make things easier.

Temporarily forgetting about the sight before her said excitedly, “Brad Pitt!!” Pam shouted. “Where?”

Ann looked over and noticed a place where a piece of the top of the wall had broken away making a small notch in the top of the wall. It wasn’t as good as the cut out square that Ann was looking though, but if she stood on the drunk she might be able to see. The place was right above Brian’s crotch.

No sooner had that happened than Brad Pitt started to pass by. Both women started to jump about excitedly. Actually she would jump some and then just stand on her tiptoes a little and then jump some more, trying to get a better look. Not that the two girls would have heard him anyway. Engrossed as they were with trying to watch the parade and Brad Pitt go by. They paid him no mind what so ever. He was just something to stand on to watch the parade go by.

Finally the parade did go by and when it was finished Pam turned around and stepped down from Brian’s crotch. Then she realized that she had been jumping up and down on some man’s crotch and felt very weird. She said to Ann, “How did we end up standing on some guy?” She was hoping Ann, who was still standing on Brian’s face like it was a natural place to stand, would say something that would make it all right.

No such luck, as Ann turned and said, “ Oh him!” She stamped on Brian’s face to make her point. “Don’t mind him. He’s just some drunk who got in our way.”

Right away a million arguments popped into Pam’s head, but she quickly realized she didn’t want to make any of them. She just wanted to slink away while Ann was still standing on his face and he couldn’t see who she was. With that she said bye and hurried on her way.

Ann was in no particular hurry to step down from Brian’s face, but she suddenly realized how tired she was and decided to sit down and have a smoke. She casually stepped down from Brian’s face and flipped her skirt back and sat down right on Brian’s upturned face!

As Ann was smoking her cigarette she was looking down and noticed her spike-heeled shoes. They were starting to show their wear. They were her favorite shoes and she wore them everyday to work. They were a little smudged and on this hot day her feet were sweaty and hot inside of them. As she stubbed out her cigarette she had a bright idea! She would let the drunk clean them for her!

She suddenly slid back to sit on the drunk’s belly and slammed both shod feet into Brian’s face and said, “Lick these!”

His head reeling from the powerful shod foot slamming into his face, Brian started to lick her dirty soles in earnest. He could taste the dirt adhering to the bottom of her shoes. Seeing that wasn’t going to work very well she just took off her shoe so she could feed it to him. 11511211112121211.title: Drunk in my way

115112111121212111.content:
Billy was just like the other kids in his neighborhood, with one minor exception. For as long as he could remember, he had always been fascinated by female feet and the high heels they frequently wore. He would fantasize for hours on end about being a tiny person strapped to the sole of a beautiful goddess’s shoe and would masturbate at the thought of her casually crushing him with every step as she went about her normal business.

He would also dream about being trampled by the two women in his life, which at that point consisted of his mother Stephanie and his aunt Jen, who was living with his mother at the time. He could think of nothing more arousing than having these two beautiful women stepping on and walking all over him without a care in the world, treating him in essence, like he was just a part of the floor. He knew there was very little chance of ever making his fantasy’s a reality… that is, until he found the crawl space in the basement.

His mother and aunt had always believed that children should be seldom seen and never heard. Not that they disliked having him around, but they never included him in their conversations and if he did try to pipe in, they would quickly lecture him about how it wasn’t polite to interrupt the grownups while they were talking and tell him that he should run off and play on his own. It was this very attitude that lead to the discovery of his lifetime.

One afternoon while playing in the basement, he noticed a small entry space in the corner of the wooden floor. After several minutes of fumbling around with the opening, he was able to pull the floor back, revealing a dark and ominous passage. Because he could scarcely see more than a few feet into the hole, he didn’t immediately venture in. Instead, he decided to find a flashlight and a few other supplies for his expedition into the unknown.

He made sure that he planned accordingly. After all, in all of the adventure books that he had read, he knew that having the right supplies was crucial to the success of any mission. He threw several tools into his backpack, consisting of a flashlight, screwdriver, hammer, and rope. He also added a sweatshirt and stocking cap as he was unsure how long he would be in the crawl space and didn’t know how cold it would be.

With his supplies ready, he went into the study where his mother was typing away at the keyboard. She had spent that last few weeks at the computer working day in and day out to complete her Masters thesis. She still had a solid month of work ahead of her, and because she was so preoccupied with finishing it, she barely even looked up when Billy mentioned he was going to go over to his friend’s house and would be back in a few hours. She mumbled something about staying out of trouble and went back to typing. Now that he was off the hook with his mother, he knew that he could spend the next few hours exploring to his hearts content.

Arriving at the crawl space a few minutes later, he was very excited and eagerly pried open the floorboard opening. After running through a quick checklist of his gear, he jumped in and pulled the door closed. He was immediately plunged into darkness, but switched his flashlight on and had a look around. It took several seconds for his eyes to adjust to his new surroundings, but he was gradually able to see that there were two possible routes, one right, and the other left. Choosing to go right, he made his way along the passageway on his hands and knees.

It was very creepy and he was sure he was going to run into something scary around every twist and turn. He had been in the passage for roughly ten minutes when he heard something strange, but somehow familiar. He froze the second he heard the noises and listened intently for the next few minutes. Somewhere up ahead, he could hear an odd, clicking sound. It would come in bursts of four to five seconds and then abruptly stop. It would begin again a few seconds later and repeat this same pattern. Puzzled, he decided to make his way toward the sounds as best he could.

He eventually came to a side passage and turned to face it when he realized that this was where the sounds were coming from. He could also make out a very dim light coming from the path ahead, which added to his excitement and fear. He debated what his next course of action should be, but ultimately let his curiosities get the better of him and decided to proceed down the side passage. Little did he know that this decision would forever change him and have such a profound impact on his later years.

It wasn’t long before he was very close to the source of this strange light and sound. Although his senses were telling him to go back, something inside of him again urged him forward. Perhaps there was some cosmic force at work, or maybe it was simply his boyish sense of excitement and discovery. Whatever it was, he simply knew he couldn’t turn back now.

As he came around the corner, he immediately saw brilliant, white beams of light pouring into the dark tunnel from above. It reminded him of something out of a science fiction movie and he again had to fight the instinct to turn and scurry back in the direction he had come. Inching himself forward, he approached the light with caution. His flashlight revealed a fairly large grating above him, roughly one foot wide and three feet long. Although the first two feet of the grate were covered with some type of material, the last foot was uncovered and he could see objects in the room beyond.

As he moved forward into the lighted opening and peered out, he first saw what appeared to be a giant, wooden wall rising up on his left. Just past that, he could make out a ceiling fan twirling slowly through the air. Upon seeing these things, he suddenly realized where he was, as well as what the strange clicking sounds were. He was looking through the large vent in the floor of his mother’s office and the wooden structure was actually the left side of her desk! The sounds he could hear were her fingernails clacking away on the keys of the keyboard. This meant the covered part of the grate that he had first seen was the part immediately underneath her desk and that the material covering it was actually a large matt that she had put down to keep her feet off of the cold, steel grate.

As he sat there letting his discovery sink in, a sinister thought popped into his head. If he was indeed underneath his mother’s desk, all that was separating him from her feet and beautiful high heeled shoes was a thin doormat. As he looped his fingers through the slats in the vent, he started to dismiss the idea of using this discovery to fulfill his trample and crush fantasies.

Surely, if he was to somehow slide his body up against the opening and was able to get his mom to step on him, she would quickly discover that something was underneath the mat and would investigate and possibly discover what he was up to.

As if in answer to his doubts, suddenly and without warning, he felt an intense pain in the hand that was looped through the vent. It became more intense over the next few seconds and eventually leveled out.

Although it took him a second or two to realize what had happened, it didn’t take long for him to put it all together. His mother had shifted her legs and in doing so, her foot had crashed down onto the part of the vent where his hand was now pinned. He thought for sure he would be discovered and started preparing himself for the worst. However, when nothing happened after 30 or 40 seconds, his fears began to subside.

He now became lost in a sea of ecstasy as the thought of his mom casually resting her high heel clad foot atop his small hand, crushing it into the grate played again and again in his head. A few minutes later, Stephanie started rocking her foot back and forth, driving Billy’s hand further into the slats of the vent. After a few seconds of doing this, she adjusted her feet once again and the pressure was gone.

Billy sat there for a few more minutes trying to collect his thoughts. He now realized that this was indeed a Pandora’s Box of sorts, and if he chose to open it, he may never be able to close it again. He also understood that he may not like what came out of it, but it was simply too good to pass up. He knew that the Gods had indeed smiled upon him and he had to take advantage of the miraculous opportunity that had presented itself.

Retracing his path, he eventually came to the opening in the basement and pushed the door open, making his way out of the passageway. He then made a b-line for the study to verify what he had just discovered. As he entered the den, he saw his mom still typing away at the keyboard. He peered closer at the mat underneath her desk and confirmed that her navy blue pumps were perched squarely on top of it.

His mind was racing and he nearly knocked over a vase as he quickly turned and bounded up the stairs to his room to formulate his plan. Had his mother heard him, she surely would have told him to slow down and to be more careful, but she had her headphones on and was oblivious to the world around her as she typed away on her thesis.
115112111121212111.title: Hide & Seek (unknowing trample)

1151121111212121111.content:
Billy sat quietly at the foot of his bed, his brow deeply furrowed in thought. He slowly and methodically pieced together his plan, ruling out certain things that seemed too risky and noting things that he felt he may be able to get away with. All he knew for certain was that he would have to be careful. One step too far on this new and exciting precipice could send him tumbling down to his ultimate demise. Capture and being forced to explain his strange desires was not an option.

He waited until around 9:00p then made his way to the edge of the stairs and yelled down to his mother and aunt Jen that he was heading off to bed. They were both watching TV in the living room and responded back, telling him to sleep tight and that they would see him in the morning. With that, he returned to his room and shut the door. He had a long night ahead of him, so he set his alarm for 2:00a and tried to grab a few winks.

Sleep would not come easily. His mind reeling from his new discovery and he simply could not get the visions of cruel, trampling high heels out of his mind. He tossed and turned until around midnight until he couldn’t take anymore. The thought of two more hours of restlessness was unbearable, so he entertained the idea of setting his plan into motion a little earlier than he had initially planned. Against his better judgment, he grabbed his backpack and prepared himself for the rigorous tasks ahead.

He approached his bedroom door with caution and listened intently for any sounds that would indicate Stephanie and Jen were still awake. Satisfied they were both sound asleep, he flipped on his flashlight, slowly opened his door and silently padded through the hallway and down the stairs. He took a moment to appreciate how well he had done in making his plans for tonight and how stealthily he was carrying them out. He smiled as he thought that it was something that even his favorite superheros would have appreciated.

His plan called for first tending to the rug that his mother was using to prop her feet up on. He had decided to pull the rug as far as he could to left without making it appear that it had obviously been moved. This should allow for complete access to her right foot as well as at least partial access to her left. With Stephanie so preoccupied with her thesis, he didn’t think that she would even miss the rug being gone completely, but he knew the stakes were high and didn’t want to get greedy and mess up this golden opportunity by taking any unnecessary chances.

Although her desk was extremely heavy, Billy was able to reposition the rug without too much trouble. This was a good thing, as too much noise meant waking the women and running the risk of capture and the humiliation of having to explain what he was up to. Once the rug was in place, it was time to initiate the second part of his plan.

Billy was interested in just how much he could get away with, so he figured he would test the waters by placing a few of his most treasured toys directly on the vent as well as slightly under the mat. He didn’t understand why he had chosen his favorite toys, but it somehow seemed to make sense to him and he didn’t fight it. For the vent, he placed a small, stuffed animal that he had been given when he was just four. It was a gift from his father, who was now completely out of his life and this was the one remaining link he had to him. Under the mat, he placed one of his collectible GI figures that was still in the packaging as well as one of his favorite comic books.

Once he had everything in place, he took a step back to survey his work. Not a bad layout, considering that should his mother notice the toys and ask questions, he could easily explain by saying that he had simply been playing around the desk and had forgotten to pick them up. He stared blankly for a few moments wondering what his mother’s reaction would be, as it would obviously dictate how his future plans would unfold. If she noticed the toys right away, he would know that a direct approach would most likely not work and that he would have to be extra cautious. On the other hand, if she didn’t say anything, he may be able to be more bold and end up being trampled directly. Either way, the anticipation was killing him.

He lingered a few more seconds, took one last look at his toys, and crept silently back up the stairs to his room. The rest of the night would be spent dozing in and out of consciousness with visions of being trampled by the two women he cared most for.

~Enter aunt Jen~

Unbeknownst to Billy, his aunt Jen had been preparing a late night snack in the kitchen when he had made his way down the stairs. Not knowing what to expect when she heard someone coming and saw a flashlight beam bouncing around on the walls, Jen had retreated to the darkest shadows behind the kitchen table. She quickly realized it was Billy and crept out of the kitchen and peered into the office where he was busy working away. She thought about surprising him, but decided against it, as she was intrigued by what she was witnessing. Jen made her way back to the kitchen and waited for Billy to finish whatever it was he was doing.

After what seemed like an eternity, Billy had finally headed back up the stairs and closed the door to his room. Jen immediately went over to her sister’s desk and began looking around. Upon discovering the toys and comic book she wondered out loud “This can’t be! Could this boy possibly have a….??” Her sentence trailed away and she didn’t finish it. She was suddenly taken back to her college days, reliving one the memories she had of when she had first started exploring her desires to trample. She saw the face of her then boyfriend contorted and slightly bleeding beneath her cruel, low heeled pumps and again heard the guttural sounds that had escaped his mouth whenever she shifted her feet about on his face. From that moment on, she was hooked and knew that there was no turning back. She felt a twinge between her legs and was quickly brought out of her daydream.

She thought for a few seconds before deciding how to proceed. Although she wanted to gather up all of her nephew’s toys and confront him on the spot to find out if what she was thinking was ultimately true, she decided to wait until morning to see how everything played out. There was a chance that she could use her knowledge to her advantage and the thought of trampling Billy again caused a twinge between her legs. She also felt somewhat guilty for even thinking these thoughts because, after all, she was his aunt and cared for him very deeply. Still, that didn’t mean that by trampling him she would care for him any less. On the contrary, she could show him how much she actually did care by helping him to fulfill his wants and desires. She laughed quietly and told herself that there was no reason to get all worked up over what she was quite sure would end up being nothing. Better to not count the chickens before they’re hatched, etc. She knew that tomorrow would be a very interesting day.
1151121111212121111.title: Hide and seek (Unknowning trample ) part 2

11511211112121211111.content:
Billy awoke to the sound of his mother’s cell phone ringing. As he sat up in bed and rubbed the sleep from his eyes, he realized with a gasp that it must be close to mid morning. Staring at the rays of light now filtering into his room through the blinds, he wondered for a moment how he could have slept so late. Rubbing his eyes again, he considered himself lucky to be awake at all, given the fact that he had been so unable to sleep last night. He recalled the events of the previous night and let the visions that had so thoroughly robbed him of his sleep play out once more.

In his mind, he saw his mother Stephanie walking into her office and sitting down at her desk. After adjusting the headphones of her Walkman, she slid her chair forward and her feet inevitably came into contact with his most cherished and prized possessions. He saw her black pumps resting casually on the cover of his favorite comic book and zoomed in close enough that he could hear the leather creaking as she wiggled her toes inside her shoe. As she started catching up on her email, she shifted her left foot forward and her right foot back, causing the cover to bend and rip slightly. Her feet remained in that position for a few minutes, then her left foot slid forward even further and she crossed her legs. Billy noticed that half of the pages of his once mint and highly collectible comic book are now completely creased beneath her cruel black heels. Stephanie then read a joke email from one of her friends and laughed quietly for a few seconds, completely unaware of the mayhem taking place beneath her desk. As she moved on to the next email, she twisted her foot back and forth a few times to reposition her legs, further destroying the once pristine comic book.

Before he even realized it, Billy was coming in his hand. He had subconsciously started playing with himself as he had daydreamed and had exploded as he pictured his tattered comic book beneath the beautiful black pumps his mother was so fond of wearing. He quickly ducked into the bathroom and cleaned himself up. He caught a glimpse of himself in the mirror and stopped for a few seconds as he pondered what the day would bring. He was extremely anxious to find out if his mother had been in her office yet and was half hoping that she already was and that he could sneak in behind her and observe first hand what was going on. She generally wore headphones at her desk, so he should have no problem creeping in to see the action up close. Taking a handful of Kleenex, he wiped everything up and headed for his bedroom door.

As he approached, he stopped and listened for any sounds that would indicate where Stephanie was. After a few moments, he believed he could hear her chatting in the living room, so he crept out of his room and down the stairs, eventually making his way to her office. As he entered, he was somewhat dismayed by what he saw. Piled up to the side of his mothers desk were his stuffed bear, comic book, and GI Joe action figure. He stared blankly trying to comprehend what had happened and didn’t hear his mother return. She walked up behind him and said, “There you are Billy. I was wondering if you were ever going to wake up. Can you tell me what these toys were doing under my desk? I nearly stepped on them when I sat down at the computer this morning”.

Billy nearly jumped out of his skin and whirled to face her. He stammered, “Well…uh… I was… playing with them yesterday evening and didn’t have time to put them away. I thought I would stash them under there and put them away later.” Stephanie gave him a strange look. “Are you feeling well honey? You don’t really seem yourself this morning.” Billy just looked at his feet and muttered, “Yeah, I think I might be catching a cold or something.” “Well, just make sure that you take it easy today. I don’t want you coming down with the flu. And another thing, pick up these toys and take them back to your room. I don’t want to have to tell you again!”

Billy sheepishly bent down and picked up the items that he had so carefully placed the night before. As he did, his mother slid into her desk and put her headphones on. This allowed him to steal a look at her feet and where they were positioned on the rug. Both of her feet were right where he had thought they would be… he had planned it perfectly. That was one consolation in an otherwise disappointing morning. Billy trotted upstairs to decide what he should do next.

Jen walked in a few minutes later and tapped her sister on the shoulder. She made small talk with Stephanie for a few minutes, but what she was dying to ask her sister about was Billy. She had formulated a plan of her own during the previous night and had to plant a few seeds with Stephanie in order to see it through to fruition.

When the opportunity finally presented itself, Jen asked, “So what were Billy’s toys doing under your desk? I heard you saying something to him about it and wondered what his excuse was.” Stephanie thought it was an odd question, but said with a smile, “He was just playing with them yesterday afternoon and lost track of time. I scolded him enough that I don’t think he will be doing it again any time soon.” Jen continued to prod her sister for what she ultimately driving at. “What are you going to do if leaves them there again?” she said, as she tried to squelch the devilish smile that was forming on her lips. Stephanie looked to the floor in thought, and then looked back at Jen. “I don’t know, maybe I should take them away from him for a few days. What do you think?”

Pay dirt! Jen thought in her mind. She had been hoping for this exact opening and wasn’t about to pass it up. “Well, if I were you” she said, “I think I really would step on them and dirty them up a bit. You know, just to teach him a lesson.” “Do you really think I should?” Stephanie replied. “I mean, the teddy bear was a gift from his father. I don’t think I would really want to damage that.” Jen pressed on and explained that she felt that stepping on the toys would really drive the message home to Billy. She did however agree that it was a bit extreme and was probably something that should only be done if Billy were to carelessly leave them in harms way again. After several more minutes of convincing, Stephanie agreed that this sounded like the proper course of action… something that made Jens heart flutter a few times.

The two sisters continued their conversation on other issues and finally parted company. As Jen walked away, she had butterflies in her stomach. She realized that she had set her plan into motion and that there was no going back now. The only question that remained was what her next move was going to be. She knew that Billy was going to be playing a baseball game later that evening and these events were something that she and Stephanie never missed. This would be the perfect opportunity to carry out her actions and she quickly thought of an excuse to miss the game.

When 5:00p rolled around, Stephanie was getting ready for her sons baseball game. She had changed into more casual clothes, although she still looked very sharp by most people’s standards. She was wearing a white, short sleeved shirt, with a tan cashmere sweater draped over her shoulders, and kaki pants. She then went back to her closet and perused her shoe collection. Shoes were one thing that she had always had a weakness for and over the past two years, she had amassed over 50 pairs of casual to dress shoes. After a few seconds of looking over a selection of dark brown shoes, she picked up a pair of mid heeled sandals. She felt they would be perfect for the game and would really complete her outfit.

Once she was ready, she headed for her sisters door and knocked softly. When there was no response, she cracked the door open and peeked in. Jen was lying under the blankets and appeared to be fast asleep. As Stephanie took a few steps into the room, Jen rolled over and propped herself up on one arm. “Aren’t you going to go to the game with us?” Stephanie asked with concern. Jen did her best to look like she was in complete pain. “I don’t think so” she said. “I have a killer head ache and I think I’m going to just lay low tonight. I took some aspirin earlier and hopefully they will kick in soon.” Stephanie stroked her sister’s head for a few minutes and said that they would be back by 9:00p.

With that, Stephanie got up and headed out the door. As she did, another devilish smile spread across Jen’s lips and this time she didn’t try to stop it. Her plan was fairly complex, but if she was lucky and everything ended up working out the way she was hoping, she was going to have the time of her life.
11511211112121211111.title: Hide and Seek (Unknowning trample) part 3

11511211112121211211.content:
I had worked for the Telephone Company for a number of years now and really loved the job. Most of my time was spent working in a hole and enjoying the worms eye view you’d get whenever women passed near the edge. I’d spend day's just looking and enjoying the thoughts that used to run round my head, thinking what it would be like to be under those feet and feel the harsh crush of unknowing women going about their daily business. I was always in trouble as I seemed to take longer to finish jobs than the other workers and it wasn’t long before I was left to work alone on the jobs no one wanted – the outdoor ones and generally in the rain.
I received a job one-day that interested me for some strange reason, it was a big job tracing corroded wires and renewing them without any real disruption to phones. It was the sort of job you could spend a lot of time on and no-one ever checked up on you and the icing on the cake was the portable tent you could set up over the hole to keep the rain off. Monday morning came and I loaded all the gear into the van. I was about to drive away when I noticed a large tarpaulin lying in the stock room, the heavy-duty type. A sudden thought occurred and I grabbed the tarpaulin and added it to the rest of my equipment and excitement hit me in a way it never has before. A thought had formed about how I was going to live out my fantasy – if all went according to plan I would soon be feeling the crush of women walking over me unknowingly.

I arrived at the “job” at about 10am and looked at the plans I had been given – the cable in question was just outside a shopping center down what looked like an alleyway. My heart sank; not many women felt the need to walk down blind-ended alleys so it looked as if I would be denied my chance. I trudged to the spot and my eyes widened in disbelief, not 5 meters away from the planned hole site was a doorway marked “LADIES”. I couldn’t believe my luck, I was to dig my hole and work right next to the entrance of the ladies toilets. I immediately started to fetch all the equipment I would need and my hands were shaking in anticipation. I quickly marked out the hole and lifted the concrete then spread out the tarpaulin – deliberately placing it a bit too far over toward the entrance to the toilets.

I started to dig frantically until I found the cable coverings and started to widen the hole. All the time I was doing this a steady stream of women would walk past, to and from the toilets, not paying me any attention. One thing I did notice was the fact that women would walk over a piece of the tarpaulin without paying any attention. During the course of the day the hole was finished and I erected the tent over the hole and cut out an eyepiece and watched intently. Women would come and go but stay clear of the edge of the tent by about half a meter. They did however take the shortest route to the toilet entrance, which happened to be over my strategically placed tarpaulin. Eventually I started placing small objects under the tarpaulin just to make the surface uneven and noticed it made no difference to the women; they walked over the tarpaulin completely indifferent to the uneven surface. A plan formed. Once the shopping center closed the stream of women stopped and I was alone. I waited for the attendant to lock the toilets then lifted the tarpaulin.

At this point I almost gave up on the idea when I noticed the small stones and objects I had hidden were completely crushed from the constant trampling of women. I needed a safety margin but would worry about that later. I extended the edge of the hole to the point where the women walked and covered it with wood. It was just deep enough to take my head and shoulders and I would be able to lie down from inside the tent. I replaced the tarpaulin and secured it by lifting concrete flagstones and pinning it down. The last thing I wanted was for the tarpaulin to move and leave me in view and probably arrested. I entered the tent (by this time it was getting dark) and lay in position, pushing the wood to one side. It was a perfect fit. As an afterthought I cut a small hole in the tarpaulin so I could get a view of who was coming my way when I was lying there. I packed up my gear and went home excited about what the next day would bring. Once home I couldn’t stop thinking about all of the crushed objects I had placed in the way. How could I ensure no serious injury? A thought hit me and I raced upstairs and went into the attic. After a bit of a search I found what I was looking for; a pair of safety glasses I used to wear for welding – very small but very strong.

The next morning I awoke still tired, I had dreamt all night of women stamping, crushing, kicking and trampling me with no mercy, perhaps a sign of things to come? Eventually I arrived at my hole and quickly made sure nothing had been disturbed. Everything was as I had left it and I entered the tent, I figured I would spend the morning working and leave the afternoon for my enjoyment. I worked like never before all morning but was conscious of the occasional thud as someone walked over the plank of wood over my secret hole. I felt a rush with every thud. At 11:30 I put down my tools and prepared myself. (I’d probably done about 3 day’s work by my standards).

I ensured the tent doors were tied shut and secure and put on my safety glasses. I slowly edged myself into the secret hole under the tarpaulin and moved the wood to one side. I was eventually in position and fixed my eye against the hole in the tarpaulin and watched. From my vantage point I could easily see the entrance to the alley and the entrance to the toilet. I lay there and waited, shaking in anticipation. I seemed to lie there for an eternity before anything happened, in reality it was probably only 10 minutes, then I spotted a movement.

A woman of about 30 years, long blonde hair and quite slim walked into the alley. She wore a pair of jeans, a jumper and running shoes. My heart started faster and I was sure she would spot me shaking under the tarpaulin but she continued without any sign that she knew. Closer and closer she got till her right foot landed inches from my face and her left foot passed over me. It was a bit of an anti-climax but I was still aroused, I could feel hardness forming and throbbing in my trousers. A minute or so went by and she caught me by surprise on the way out, her left foot landed square on my forehead for about a second as she walked over me. I could feel the crush but the pain was far from intense, I figured I could keep this up for hours.

Shortly after I heard voices and I spotted a group of girls coming my way. They all wore the uniform of the center supermarket and ranged from between 17 to 25 years of age. None struck me as attractive but could not be considered ugly either. There were five in total, four seemed of average weight but one was easily the weight of two of the others. I noticed they were all wearing thick-soled shoes with the chunky heels of about 3 inches wide and the same high. I couldn’t tell if they were hard or soft soled but I was about to find out. The first girl got nearer and as she stepped down the heel landed square on my mouth, I realized then she was wearing hard soled shoes because the pain was so intense, she continued over me and the pressure relaxed but I could taste blood and started to panic slightly. There was nothing I could do of course and she had stepped on my face full weight because she knew nothing of the pain she was causing- as far as she was concerned the ground was no different under the tarpaulin than anywhere else. The second and third girls walked by without catching me but the fourth girl stood on my forehead with the ball of her foot and the fifth, and heaviest, stepped on my mouth with the sole of her shoe. As the last girl stepped on me I felt real pain for a second before she walked on, all the time I was looking up at these giantesses talking and laughing without realizing what they were doing. I felt like a small insect and knew I was just as helpless – if I attempted to move out of the hole the movement would be easily spotted and I would be rumbled and have some explaining to do.

Another lady came round the corner, this one in her early forties and wearing a gray suit jacket and knee length skirt (probably one of the bank’s employees on her dinner break), I heard her before I saw her as her heels tapped out her arrival on the stone. She was wearing black stiletto shoes and looked stunning in them. As the click, click click got louder I found myself thinking “please don’t step on me, I don’t want to die as an insect”, The lady showed no signs of slowing down and reached ever closer. She was hurrying and really planting her heels firmly with every step and I hoped she would miss me completely as I didn’t know if I would be able to remain soundless if she hit. Suddenly the heel of her right shoe drove down into my cheek and the sole landed on the other cheek. The pain was excruciating and I almost shouted out, but she looked so normal as she stepped on my face and moved on. I couldn’t help myself from getting more aroused as I caught a glimpse of her stocking top and the naked thigh beyond. Even though she had stepped off and continued on her way, the pain still lingered and I could feel something wet on my cheek – I presumed it was blood.

I screwed my eyes tight shut to try and shake the cobwebs from my head when I felt a crush on my forehead which did not go away. My eyes shot open and I had a magnificent view all the way up the back of one of the previous girl’s leg. Two of them had come out of the toilets and were waiting for the other three girls to join them and decided on a cigarette. One of the girls had her heel planted firmly on my forehead and was just standing talking to her friend. The pain was quite bad but bearable and I had no choice but to take it and watch. This girl was wearing red lace unties and the view was fantastic. As they continued talking, she raised her foot from me and stood on one leg while she scratched her ankle, the relief was welcomed, as the crush was becoming unbearable. My relief was short lived however as she placed her foot down slightly further back than before and square on my nose. It must have broken instantly and the pain was unbearable, tears streamed from my eyes and all the time she continued talking and laughing unknowing of the pain she was causing.

At this point her friends emerged and she stepped of, twisting on her heel in the process and causing so much more agony than I had thought possible. Two of the other three girls missed my face as they walked over the tarpaulin but the last one trod on my nose and I think I let out a slight grunt of pain but no one noticed. I was really hurting now and was having second thoughts about the plan but I realized there was nothing I could do until the center closed. I was resigned to at least another four hours of torture and I started feeling a little nervous to say the least. The gray suited woman in the heels emerged then and slammed another heel right into my mouth as she walked over me, I felt a tooth snap and the taste of blood was back in my mouth, I was starting to feel a bit nauseous at this point and my face was a constant throbbing of pain. A woman rounded the corner next wearing a long skirt and long boots they looked pretty flat but I noticed a chunky heel just as it slammed into my eye- I was pleased I had worn the glasses- it hurt pretty bad but I managed to take the pain.

As she stepped off, two middle aged women rounded the corner laden with shopping and both wearing those hard soled shoes with the low heels of about 2 inches in size. Onward they strode and I guessed they were a pretty heavy pair, the first stepped over my face but kicked my nose on the way past and the second stepped on my cheek. I could feel the skin giving under her weight and then she was gone. I guess I wasn’t as strong as I thought I was because at this point I started crying with the pain. The first lady with the boots emerged but missed me on the way back; another lady turned into the alley wearing running shoes at the same time as the two large ladies emerged. All the women seemed to meet at the point where my face was and as one of the ladies stepped to the side to let the other through I got her heel full in the mouth and her sole on my forehead for about three seconds then she moved off, spinning on her heel in the process, I felt another tooth go.

I must have picked the busiest time of day because the next hour seemed to be a none stop parade of women all walking over my face. Large women, small women, sharp heels, hard heels, flat heels, soft shoes, hard boots, pretty girls, older women, the list was endless but my pain threshold wasn’t. As the traffic eased off I attempted to shuffle back into my tent and pack up early.

As I started to move very slowly, a lady rounded the corner wearing a red skirt and red heels of about an inch in diameter. As she approached I froze so as not to give the game away closer and closer she got until she stepped on my forehead with her heel which slipped and caused her to stumble. She was not to happy with this and returned to my face cursing the fucking council for digging holes. I heard her mutter “I’ll sue the bastards if my heel’s scratched”. I was terrified, she towered above me prodding the “ground” with her foot and commenting about how anyone could trip over the uneven ground. To my horror she started trying to trample the “earth” down with her feet, the pain was intense but I couldn’t afford to give my position away. She was looking at me and treading all over my face, she couldn’t have seen me through the tarpaulin but I could see the look of hate in her face. I heard a voice saying “ Hi, what’s happening?” – a younger lady wearing a short dress and boots with the chunky heels had seen her and stopped to talk. “I’ve nearly broken my neck tripping up on this fucking uneven ground and I’m making sure no-one else trips.” She continued to trample all over my face and was sticking at my nose, The tears were streaming and my already broken nose was being flattened and constantly pounded by the sexy red shoes. “It’s almost flat but this bit just won’t flatten, it must be a stone.” Said the first lady “allow me” said the younger lady and walked over. I was really crying with the pain at this point and I almost screamed as the younger lady placed her booted foot on my nose and started grinding my nose into my face as if she were putting out a cigarette. The nausea increased and I felt I was about to throw up but managed to swallow it down. The pressure released and I heard her sat “It is a stubborn bastard isn’t it, This will do the trick though” I saw her raise her foot and she looked beautiful- long black hair, well tanned muscular legs and a body to die for, I was horrified as it dawned on me what was about to happen. She stamped her foot down as hard as she could and slammed her heel into my nose, lifted her foot and repeated the process another two times. It may have been more but at this point I passed out.

I regained consciousness much later, it was dark and the place was deserted, the pain in my head was intense and I could taste blood and vomit. I eased myself back into the tent and quickly and painfully filled the hole and replaced the flagstones, only the main hole was left. I loaded the van and went home, not a person was in sight, hardly surprising as my watch said 3:30 am. I arrived home and headed for the shower with my head pounding. I had no idea how many women had walked on my face after I passed out but it felt like thousands. I stepped into the bathroom and looked into the mirror and what stared back at me made me shout out involuntarily. My face was totally unrecognizable as human. My nose was just a large swollen lump of red flesh flattened to my face. I was covered in gashes and I had a deep gash running down my forehead (probably where the lady in red had slipped). I was missing four teeth and my lips were so swollen and cut up that they were four times the normal size. My left ear was torn and hanging limply on the side of my head- I presumed this injury was sustained when I was unconscious- and I was a mask of blood. I was so frightened of being more seriously injured internally that I made up a story about being attacked and went to hospital. In casualty the doctor said he had never seen such horrific injuries and wondered how a human being could intentionally cause so much damage to someone else with no remorse. I kind of smiled inside thinking that all the damage was done unintentionally and not as he thought. He estimated that I must have been beaten for a considerable period of time and someone must have stamped repeatedly on my face. I explained I blacked out after the first blow and didn’t know much about the attack and at this point blacked out again. I awoke in a hospital bed and heard myself moan. A soft voice spoke saying: “I see we’re awake now, are you feeling any better” a nurse walked to my bedside and smiled as she gently wiped my face clean of blood. “I think we’ll be seeing a lot of each other, the doctor thinks you’ll need at least a week to recover.” I looked at her and smiled. She was a pretty young thing, long black hair, well tanned muscular legs and a body to die for. The realization hit me and I started to laugh even though it hurt to do so. It was quite ironic really, the nurse who was to nurse me back to health was the very one who had stamped me into unconsciousness in the first place…

By Andy

115112111121212112111.content: Back in my younger days in the service business, I maintained the cooling and dispensing equipment for the beer in a restaurant and bar here in town. The manager wanted to convert the lever dispenser to a foot operated system so the girls could hold more mugs to be filled at one time. I moved the equipment from under the counter to the room below the bar and installed three pivot lever switches on the floor in front of the dispenser. I had one of the girls come over and try it out when I had finished. It was in the summer time and the girls wore shorts and sandals with two inch heals. I watched as she stepped on the rubber covered lever and shifted her weight forward on the toe to start the beer flowing. .. She presented me with the first beer. I told the manager I would return that night to make sure the equipment functioned properly. When I arrived I went directly to the basement room where the kegs and equipment were stored, locked the door and watched thru the hole in the baseboard as the girls would depress the pedal to dispense the beer. Man!, I sat there for an hour watching the pretty little feet come to one of the levers ad press down with their toes. I began to find myself breathing harder and harder as I could position my face within inches of these pretty little feet and watch the toes press the pedal. .. I returned the next night with a plan. By removing the pivot pin and holding the lever in my left hand, I could stick my fingers into the rubber sleeve and when the girls would step on them, I would operate the lever to dispense the beer. I found that if I was a little slow in pressing the lever that more pressure would be applied to my fingers by the pretty little feet with the opened toe sandals. I was in heaven! ..The next night I returned with a five gallon bucket that I could stand on. That night one of the girls had clear plastic sandals with some of the prettiest little toes I had ever seen. .. I would watch when she would come and depress the lever. The toes would slip off the front of the sandal, bend down and she would work it as though she was milking a cow. I had a hard that would not quit!. .. Again, all the blood that normally occupied my brain went directly to my hard and it began to make my decisions for me. I found that with the assistance of the bucket I had been sitting on I could now stand on and insert my hard into the rubber sleeve. Since I didn't want to have my privates damaged I was quick to operate the lever when pressure was applied to my hard. .. When the clear plastic sandals came up I was slow and found that she would apply more pressure and work me as though she was milking a cow. I could watch by looking down through the crack in the sealed doors as she struggled to get the machine to function. It took only 15 seconds for me to loose my load and start dispensing the beer. I became so light headed that I fell off the bucket. The manager called me at home the next morning and said the girls were complaining that the dispenser was operating very slow at times. ... Needless to say It took me almost a week to finally get it adjusted. By then I seemed to have an almost permanent hard that was many different shades of black and blue. ... Only one of many pleasurable memories of an aging serviceman. ... Mark, .. Again I remind you to keep my ID secret as I still enjoy a crush or two from time to time. ... Thanks!

1151121111212121121111.content:
Like many others, my experiences of being crushed or walked over have been limited to hand or finger crushes. This summer however, I decided to be ‘brave’ and seize an opportunity of a lifetime. Please take 5 minutes to read this true story and the background to it.

My local athletics club, where I am a member, has an annual open day in August involving marquees, a buffet and an evening barbecue. It is the biggest day in the Club’s calendar and all the members volunteer their services. The catering is done by a lady called Linda from the Club who makes her living at it, and the waitressing and serving staff on the day are wives, girlfriends or friends of Club members. Having volunteered to help with the setting up the night before, I was able to assist Linda in the fetching and carrying of cooking equipment and positioning of tables, chairs and other facilities for the grand day.

Towards night fall, after a long and arduous day’s setting up, people started to drift away. Linda, her daughter Sammy, and myself were left and sat down with a deserved drink. The only thing left to do was to lay the carpet strip between the temporary kitchen and the back of the marquee over the grass area. This would be necessary for the ladies to go back and forth on the big day, without getting muddy or sinking into the turf. A plan hatched instantly in my mind. But would I go through with it?

I promised Linda that I would have the carpet strip in place by the time they arrived next morning to set up the food at 8am. As this was the last job to do and she was extremely tired, she agreed to leave me that job and left for home with Sammy. When they left, I was almost beside myself with excitement at how I could lay under that carpet strip without being noticed. The only way I concluded, was to remove some grass and soil, lay in the dip and roll the carpet back over me. So I hatched my plan and began digging a little ‘shallow grave’ in the centre of the proposed strip. After about 20 minutes I had successfully dug enough to lay down in the dip and be level with the remaining turf. I laid the removed soil into a wheelbarrow and hid it behind some sheds. It was now way past 10pm and on my way home I rang Linda to tell her that the carpet strip was down but to be aware that part of the ground was likely to give a little underfoot as I’d had to level it out.

Barely able to sleep (I didn’t at all!) I imagined what would happen to me. And before the sun came up I was dressed in jeans and T-shirt. I drove to the athletics club and arrived around 7am. Once there I made for the marquee and began rolling out the large, foam backed green carpet. It was about 4 feet wide and about 100 feet long. When it was laid flat covering the dug up area, I could easily lift one edge and lay in the hole. Before that, I placed the temporary white picket fences side by side, thus making a corridor along the carpeting. It looked pretty good. When everything was in place, I took a deep breath and crawled underneath the carpet. Making a tiny hole in the foam backing with the tip of a dart, I could see daylight through the opening and pressing my eye to it, could clearly get a view of the world above. It was now 7.35am. I laid there heart racing, wondering if this would work or if I would be discovered. What would I say then!? And should I go face up or lay my head to one side?

Within 10 minutes a car approached and doors opened and closed. I recognised the voices of Linda and her daughter. I heard Linda tell Sammy to go the kitchen and turn on the ovens. Seconds later her approaching footsteps resonated the carpet above me. Instinctively, I turned my head to one side. Then she passed right over me – stepping on my thighs, chest and off – without stopping to question what was below her feet. It was an awesome sensation. Linda came next, travelling along the green walkway. Again I turned my face away. She trod over me without her knowledge, firmly down onto my lower legs, stomach and the top part of my head. The foam carpet backing cushioned the heel of her shoe but could not disguise the weight of an estimated 140-pound woman treading down mercilessly. I lay motionless, almost afraid to move should the carpet above me move. 20 year-old Sammy returned a few moments later trampling over me once more, a lighter version of her mother, this time from upper torso to legs and off. Her steps were far less damaging, either due to her shoes or her weight. I decided to risk looking through the eye-hole I had made. Sammy came back. I felt the carpet resonate again. I looked through the hole and felt her tread down onto my legs. Looking up, her hands and arms came into view and she stepped onto my chest. She was carrying trays and a box of cutlery, arms clutching the load. Briefly I could make out her black skirt and white blouse then immediately her right shoe came down next to the eye-hole. The rush of air made my eyes water as a black sandal just missed my face completely. The view was extraordinary…a giant foot above me, a leg stretching upwards for what seemed like miles and then clear blue skies as she walked on.

More vehicles were arriving. Doors opening and closing. A minibus engine shut down and various female voices started up. The voices got closer. Several women I could make out. Some voices I recognised as wives, some voices were new to me. Again the carpet was reverberating above me. I turned away again and a series of feet stepped down onto me one after another. This time my groin, stomach, chest and head felt the impact as perhaps 6 or 7 pairs of shoes passed their way over me. I couldn’t believe what was happening. It was amazing. I lay there numbed with the sheer excitement of what situation I was in. Soon, the women walked back and forth over me at regular intervals as the food and tables were prepared for the day. I had been there for about half an hour by now and been trampled probably 50 times already. But I wanted to feel the weight of a woman treading on my face. I had turned my head aside since I didn’t know which one was walking across me. Some were naturally lighter and younger, and wore flatter shoes or slides. The middle-aged women tended to be higher heeled and heavier. I decided to risk it for the next trampling. Turning my face again upwards as I felt the carpet tremble, I could see the sky again. Then a shoe trod on my lower legs…the next step was on my upper stomach…I could see the woman above me. She was dead center on the carpet. I didn’t recognise her but she was younger. Fair haired I quickly noted, again in black skirt and white blouse, bare legged. I saw her left leg swing forward and in an instant her shoe found my face. The view was reduced to the underneath of her sandal. Her chunky low heel met my lip and sole pressed onto my forehead. The foam pressed down irresistibly for a second and keeping my eyes open, I could actually see the underneath of the arch of her sandal as my face took her full weight. It really hurt. My lip started to bleed a little and I was stunned at the initial pain. But it was exactly what I wanted to feel. Being trodden on without mercy and unknowingly…
1151121111212121121111.title: Trample Underneath A Carpet

11511211112121211211112.content:
Gary had been into trampling from a very young age. Eventually, like all good boys, he grew up and bought a house outside San Diego. He never married and was smart enough to save his cash. Eventually, his trampling needs became so great that he bought another house. It was a small two bedroom place that was almost completely gutted out. It needed major work inside, but this would never get completed.

This house became the tool to exercise his trampling desires. His idea was to call real estate agents have them come over and give his property a market analysis. These days there are a tremendous amount of women in the real estate game. Most of these women dress nicely, suits and heels. So in his new home Gary built several false floors. Some with face holes, others with just enough space to allow his body to squeeze in.

Day one: Marci from Century Twenty One.

She pulled up in an Lincoln Continental. From his conversation with her, Gary told her that he couldn’t be there to greet her, but he’d leave the key in his “secret spot” on the porch to allow her entry. There she would be able to inspect the premises in order to complete her analysis. She agreed. Now as she exited the car dressed in a beautiful gray dress suit. The jacket was very sharp with angular shoulders, and her skirt stopped several inches above her knee. She was taller than Gary expected, her shoulder length blond hair was styled similarly to Scully from the X-Files. Gary was erect from the moment he saw her. She was absolutely gorgeous, and couldn’t have been a day over 33. After this quick survey from up on the second floor, his eyes fell to her shoes. They were a slightly darker gray than her suit, and the suede heels were a respectable 3 inches in height. They were wider heels probably an inch in diameter. Anyway, as she stepped onto the porch to search for the “secret spot”, Gary quickly went into his first false spot the face hole.

The anticipation was killing him as he heard Marci enter the house and begin her work on the first floor. The heels clicked off of the hard would floors. He warned her that the house was getting major work done, so not to worry about the debris scattered on the floors. She said she understood. Finally, as Gary was lay there he heard her steps coming up the stairs. He had wisely chosen the face hole spot’s location, putting it underneath a window with an amazing view of San Diego five miles away. He had hopes that the women would step over to see this view. Previous to her arriving, Gary had arranged the area beneath the window so that, in order for someone to look out of the window, they would have to stand on or next to his face. He had pulled a “paint drip” sheet over the hole, but placed it so he could see slightly at ground level. It was thin so it would ensure almost bare face feeling.

As she entered the room Gary could see her feet. His heart was beating harder and harder, faster and faster. He became even more excited when he noticed her stepping on pieces of wood, underneath other “paint drip” sheets, as though she didn’t care. Then she approached Gary’s position.

Because of the sheet Gary couldn’t see where she was, but he knew she must be standing above him. Then before he knew it her high heeled foot came crashing down on his face. The soul had found his forehead and her heel landed below and to the right of his nose catching his upper lip. The pain shot through his face and he nearly panicked. She stood on him for about 15 seconds, then he heard her say, “amazing” (in regards to the view). Then while she continued standing on Gary’s face, she dug through her purse for something. She started talking, and Gary realized she had grabbed and dialed somebody on her cellular phone. As she talked she lifted the soul of her foot into the air so her shoe rested on the heel. She slowly twisted the heel as she spoke to the person, not realizing the tremendous amount of suffering she was inflicting on Gary beneath her. As she spoke, Gary in agony, began whispering to himself, “please ma’am, I’m stuck down here, please help me….” After thirty more seconds, she lifted her foot off of him. He was relieved, feeling the trickle of blood escape from his lip. Then her foot returned. Unfortunately for him, her heel now sat perfectly on his eye. He hadn’t expected that. She shifted her weight and stepped off. The pain was intense, but the incredible fear of losing his eye kept him from shouting out. He heard her leave the room and after another three minutes, he heard her leave his house.

He quickly exited the false floor and went into the bathroom. His eye was completely red (and would be black for the next eight days), and his mouth was swollen with a little bit of blood on the underside of the lip.

After a beer, and a few minutes to ponder his experience (if you know what I mean). He picked up the phone to Re-Max Partners and spoke to a Jenny. “Hi, I’m calling to get a market analysis done on my home.”

More real estate adventures to follow, cheers.

Two doormats? $13.00
Duct tape? $3.00
Being happily trampled by fifteen different goddesses, all dressed in fetish gear and boots or high heels? Priceless!

Then I hung them over my head, the duct “straps” hanging on my shoulders, like the old sign carriers, one doormat in front, one hanging down in back. Both mats had “Welcome” on them, so there was little doubt what they were.

Two women, both heavier, and in their thirties (not much to look at, but both wearing spike heeled boots) and tight leather fetish gear, and very buzzed, walked up to me in the lobby and asked what I was. “I’m a doormat, of course…but you can call me Matt,” I said, laughing. “Oh, that is so perfect!” one woman exclaimed. “Let me take your picture.” She got her camera up and was about to snap right there, but I said, “Okay, let’s move off to the side.” I walked out of the traffic lanes and laid down without a word. The woman burst out laughing and said, “Oh my God, you want me to stand on you?!”

“ I thought you wanted a picture standing on the doormat?” I said, smiling, looking up at them.
“Oh, no, I just meant…”
“Oh, go ahead,” said her friend.
“I’d kill him! I weigh 160 and I’ve got these boots on!” she said, giving me a good look at her sharp heels. (There were several recurring themes all night long; the first was the woman’s desire to tell me exactly how much she weighed before she stepped on me with that weight. “She looked down at me and said, doubtfully, “You’re not feeling this?”

You need to turn the flash on. No, the little green one…" she shifted her weight unconsciously from one heel to the other, grinding me beneath her and deforming the mat. People walked by with amused smiles, looking at me and laughing. "Want me to help you?” She asked her friend. " No I’m okay, I'll get it," Her friend said, in no particular hurry.

Finally, her friend was ready and snapped the picture. I don't know if the tears forming at the edges of my eyes will show up! The woman stepped off me still laughing and said “Thanks! That was a lot of fun. “Anytime!” I replied.

Already, my ribs felt as if they have been broken! They walked off without even looking back as I slowly got up groaning. They were laughing to themselves. It amazed me, how many people walked by and absolutely ignored me, laying there being stepped on. It was gonna be a good night!
