“A couch cushion?” said Mrs. Thompson. “And sit on him?”

“Yep,” said Amy, chucking. “For real.”

“Interesting,” said Mrs. Thompson. Sherman watched as she approached the bed. He saw her legs turn around. Then Mrs. Thompson sat down on the bed next to Amy. The additional weight on the bed pressed the bedsprings onto his chest. Mrs. Thompson crossed her lovely thighs. It now felt to Sherman as if both Amy and her mother were sitting on him. He loved the view of the underside of their thighs as they sat on the edge of the bed, unknowingly making him endure the bedsprings crushing his chest and head.

“And what did you tell him?” said Mrs. Sherman. “ I mean about using him as something to sit on?”

“Mom!” exclaimed Wendy. “What do you, think, we told him… What a crazy idea.”

“Maybe,” said Mrs. Thompson.

“What do you mean, maybe?” said Wendy. “We can’t use a human being as something to sit on. We’d hurt him.” She got up from the vanity bench, came over to the bed, and sat down on the other side of her sister. Now the three Thompson women were sitting on the edge of the bed, and their combined weight atop the bed, pushing the bed springs onto his body both excruciatingly painful, yet exciting. He viewed the three sets of tanned legs above him and pretended the Thompson women were sitting on him instead of the bed.

“Well…” Marsha Thompson hesitated then spoke: “It could be done… I mean… use him as something to sit on.”

“What are you saying, mom?” asked Wendy. “Do you want to sit on Sherman and squish him!”

“Okay, girls,” said Mrs. Thompson. “I’m going to tell you something, and I hope it never leaves this room, agreed?”

“Sure,” the girls said in unison, excitement in their voices.

“When I was in college, your age, a freshman and just eighteen, I had a similar offer from a student friend.”
15211111111111211.title: A Mothers’ Confession pt. 1 by Couchman

152111111111112111.content:
“He wanted you to sit on him?” asked Amy.

“Yes,” replied their mother. “At first I thought it was kind of creepy. But in those days I was adventurous and ready to try nearly anything… He laid down on my couch and I sat on him… At first I would only sit on his chest, but the fool insisted I sit on his face.”

“Did you, mom?” asked Amy, enthused. “Did you sit on his face?”

“I was hesitant about it,” said Marsha. “I was wearing a skirt. I thought I’d be embarrassed if he saw my panties when I sat on his face, let alone concerned that I’d squish him.”

“So?” asked Amy, with growing excitement in her voice. “Did you?… Did you sit on his face?”

“Well,” continued Marsha. “The young man wanted to experience what it’s like to be an object, a cushion for a chair or couch… I don’t think about where my skirt goes when I sit on something… I was doing my hair. He was laying on the couch. And I went over and sat on his face, with my skirt over his head. I really sat on his face, girls, with my whole weight squishing him.”

“Was it fun, mom? Asked Wendy.

“Yes, I couldn’t believe how much I enjoyed it. I loved the feeling of his face under my butt. I loved the feeling of being allowed to dominate him so completely that I could treat him as a nothing… just something to sit on.”

“So, do you want to sit on Sherman?” asked Amy. Amy seemed more enthused about sitting on him than her sister.

“I might,” said Marsha. “If he could handle it. But let me continue… After I sat on my student friends’ face, I was hooked. He didn’t even have to ask. I invited him to come live with me… not as a typical roommate, though, as a human cushion… something for me to sit on whenever I wanted.”

“Did you sit on his face with a skirt?” asked Amy.

“Of course,” replied their mother. “I mean… after all… I began to think of him not as a person, as an object for me to sit on. It didn’t matter to me if he saw my panties when I sat down on his face… after all… He was only a cushion… I undressed in front of him… and even slept on him…not for the purpose of having sex. I slept on him because, to me, he was simply an object.”

“I could sit on Sherman,” volunteered Amy. “If he doesn’t care if I squish him.”

“There might be a problem with that,” cautioned Marsha. “The problem was… well…” she cleared her throat, nervously. “I got so used to using him like a piece of furniture instead of a person… well…”

“What, mom?” asked Amy.

“I sat on his face one night. I was enthralled with something on T.V. and I forgot he was under me.”

“Oh, no!” exclaimed Amy. She uncrossed one thigh then crossed her legs with the other. “What happened?”

“I got up from his face and realized he wasn’t breathing… not at all.”

“No!” said Wendy. Her voice trembling. “You suffocated him! You smothered him to death!”

“Shh!” Marsha tried to calm her down. “Yes. You can’t sit on someone’s face for very long without the inevitable.”

“What did you do?” trembled Wendy.

“Well… those were wild days. “ I knew someone… someone… shall we say… in dark places. He took care of the body. No one ever found out.”

Silence filled the room. But suddenly, much to Sherman’s surprise, Amy began to laugh.

“My mother,” chuckled Amy. “Sat on someone to death.”

“It isn’t funny,” said Wendy. “I believe it’s called murder.”

“Well… Sort of,” said Marsha. “He took the risk of something like that happening when he volunteered to be my human cushion.”

Wendy got up off the bed, relieving the pressure from his chest. Sherman watched intently as she went to her closet and brought out a large toy… a stuffed rabbit nearly as tall as she.

“Please get up,” she said to her sister and mother. “I want to try something.
152111111111112111.title: Mothers Confession pt. 2 by Couchman

1521111111111121111.content:
Wendy and her mother got up off the bed, allowing Sherman a huge feeling of relief. He saw Wendy approach the bed carrying the huge stuffed rabbit. She laid the rabbit atop the bed and said to it, as if it were alive. “I hope you don’t mind if I sit on you, Harvey.” Sherman watched as her legs turned around. Wendy sat down, apparently on the rabbits’ face, and crossed her smooth thighs.

“Harvey doesn’t care if I sit on his face,” said Wendy. “I can sit on his face all day if I want to… and I don’t have to worry about what to do with the body.” She emphasized body.

Sherman wished he could turn into the toy rabbit Wendy was sitting so nonchalantly on, without any concern over hurting him.

Said Wendy: “If I sat on Sherman’s face like this… well… you know.”

“We’d have to be careful,” said Marsha.

“Oh, mom,” said Wendy. “You’re not actually thinking about using Sherman as a human cushion for us to sit on.”

“I would do it,” said Amy. “I would sit on Sherman… I’ll sit on his face.” She pulled at her sister to get up off of the rabbit. Wendy got up, and Amy, with a flurry of skirt and a round, yellow pantied butt, sat down on the rabbits’ face, pushing the bedsprings onto Sherman’s face. “I’ll sit on his face… just like I’m sitting on Harvey.”

“That’s cruel,” uttered Wendy.

“Sort of,” added their mother. “It depends on how you look at it. If Sherman didn’t want us to sit on him, yet we sat on him anyway… now that might be considered cruel.” She paused. “Although I must admit… that young man I sat on in college, after awhile, got tired of me sitting on him, but I did insist. I wanted to dominate him with my butt and my weight.”

“But,” added Wendy. “If we use him like an object, would it always have to be as a seat? I mean… What if I wanted him as my door mat or something and walked all over him or simply stood on top of him… then I’d really crush him.”

“Interesting idea,” said Marsha. “The young man in college… I sat on him a lot, but I guess I never considered walking on him or standing on him.”

“Well,” huffed Wendy. “If we went, that, far… why don’t we also use Sherman as a toilet and pee on him.” Her voice was filled with sarcasm.

“Hmm,” said Amy. She was growing more and more excited about completely dominating Sherman. “Do you think Sherman would let me pee on him?”

“Goss!” said Wendy. She asked he sister to get up off of her weighty perch on top of Harvey the stuffed rabbit. Sherman peeked under the bedspread as Wendy laid Harvey down on the floor.

“You have to be my doormat,” Wendy said to the rabbit as if he were alive. “I’m going to step on you.” She lifted a leg and placed one foot on the rabbit. Then she lifted the other foot and stood on top of it, her high heel sandals pressing deep into its’ soft furry body. Then she said with mock indignation. “Are you looking up my skirt, Harvey? Shame on you. Just for that…” She stepped down from Harvey. “I’m going to sit on your face.” Sherman’s eyes widened as a watched Wendy lower her butt to the rabbits’ face. Her skirt went over his head, and her panty covered butt mashed onto the rabbits’ face. Amy laughed and applauded. “Yeah,” she said. “That’ll teach Harvey to look under your skirt.”

Wendy remained seated on the rabbits’ face, her legs up at a about a forty five degree angle, her skirt draped over his stuffed rabbit head, and her butt crushing its’ face nearly flat.

“If I sat on Sherman like this,” warned Wendy. “Oh my gosh I’d hurt him.”

Sherman envisioned himself as the stuffed rabbit, with Wendy nonchalantly sitting on his face. He could imagine everything except the actual weight of Wendy crushing him.

“Well, girls,” said Marsha. “It’s going to be up to Sherman. I’m sure that my human seat back in college didn’t realize just how painful it would be with a hundred thirty pound girl sitting on him… until I actually did it.”

“Oh, mom,” said Wendy, getting up off the rabbits’ face. “Are you really going to take Sherman up on his offer? I mean… sitting on Harvey is one thing. He can’t feel pain. But Sherman…”

“Do it, mom,” encouraged Amy. “I want to sit on him.”

“I’ll think about it,” said their mother.

The prospect of Marsha and her daughters using him as something to sit on, walk on, and even pee on, was exciting Sherman so much his head was covered with beads of sweat. He hoped they couldn’t smell his sweat and discover his hiding place so near to them. Marsha mentioned something about going shopping again. And Sherman was relieved when they all left the room, allowing him the chance to get out from under the bed and sneak back out of the house.

After he made it back to his own house, Sherman felt dizzy from the experience. His face and chest were sore from getting crushed under the weight of the Thompson women as they sat-- unaware of his presence-- on the bed. He wondered how it would feel if they actually sat on him instead of the bed. He wondered if they would crush his ribs if they sat down on his chest, or break his nose if they sat on his face. Yet, he thought, that young man Marsha had sat on back when she was in college must have endured her weight for sometime, before Marsha accidentally smothered him to death. He also wondered if Marsha was really going to take him up on his offer and ask him to be their human cushion, or if it was all talk. The idea of transcending social boundaries and becoming part of a small world where the unthinkable was happening: being used by beautiful girls as an object to plant their sexy butts on was tempting to Sherman, despite the obvious risks involved. He decided to leave the next move up to Marsha and her daughters. He wasn’t about to ask them to do it. He wanted them to ask him. He decided to act as if he hadn’t even offered them his body as a place to sit and discover how they approached the subject.
1521111111111121111.title: Mothers Confession pt. 3 by Couchman

15211111111111211112.content:
Ricky Lane would be considered a B&E specialist. He was small in stature,
although not technically what fools would call a midget. He was actually just a really small guy. Historically he had been involved with thefts of small electronics and
jewels. Lately though, he saw a far more lucrative angle which involved computer hacking, password theft and phishing. His latest target was a retired political lobbyist. His objective was to gain access to her computer and divert sums of money destined for foreign government and lobby groups’ slush funds to his own account. Ricky always chose homes with minimal to moderate security. This target had two cats but
otherwise lived alone in a rather unassuming townhouse. In the past couple of days, she appeared to be getting ready for a trip. He knew that she had canceled several subscriptions and deliveries for a few weeks. He presumed that she would require someone to check on her cats periodically. Anyway for insurance purposes, she would need the place looked in on, every 3 days. He observed another lady arrive at the
residence 2 days prior to the owner's scheduled departure. He assumed that she was the one who would be checking on the house and felines.

The visitor appeared to be very tall. She towered over the owner as she was greeted and ducked her head slightly as she entered the home. Ricky thought it unlikely that the visitor would return for a couple of days after the owner left on vacation. He was a careful man by nature. He made no reckless assumptions. He didn't want to be caught off guard by any surprises. Ricky Lane was a mere 3 feet 3 inches in height and weighed less than 100 pounds. He had spent all of his 22 years avoiding confrontation because of his diminutive stature. It was Tuesday and he guessed she would be back either on Friday or before. A pretty girl like that was certain to have plans for the weekend. He decided he
would make his move after she left on Friday. He was certain of this but he waited in his van just down the block through the next two days anyway. As he had predicted, the tall blond returned early Friday afternoon. She let herself in and it took her only 30 minutes to check on things and care for the cats. Ricky was able go retrieve the code that the cat sitter had used and his phishing equipment had done the same for the security code inside. It was 2:30 in the afternoon and he was quite sure he could be in and out in 40 minutes or even less. Even so he waited until almost 5 o'clock before entering the house. It was already getting dark. Mostly due to the time of year but the winter sky was also heavily clouded. He preferred the cloak of darkness when be was working anyway.
He was in the house now. The computer was in the den. He realized after only 15 minutes that he would not need to be here long. He looked around the room as he waited for his system to download all the pertinent information from the host hard drive. He paused at the doll sitting in one of the chairs on the other side of the desk. It was roughly the same size as Ricky. He was nearly finished transferring file information when he heard something. The front door! The lock clicked and the door was opening. Ricky was panicked. His eyes darted around the room for an escape. The doll on the chair stared blankly back at him. He darted from behind the desk. There was no time to clear
the cables from the desk. He had no place to hide. The woman opened the door and came in. She closed the door behind her and walked straight into the study, drawn by light from the desk lamp. Had it been on when she was here earlier, she wondered? She had not
been in the room before. She had walked passed it when she come for the house-sitting instructions from the owner. She saw the cables on the desk but didn't think anything of it. Her cell phone buzzed. She sat in one of the office chairs as she read the text. She thought this must be one of those massaging chairs but she decided it must be a cheap one because she could barely feel it moving under her butt. Nonetheless, it was kind of a pleasant feeling. It reminded her of when she had begun as an Amazon model. At 6' 6" and over 250 pounds, Stephanie Towers was the perfect Amazon temptress. She was blessed with wonderful curves, an athletic build and an incredibly sexy smile. She had been planning to meet a prospective model that evening but now the plans had fallen
through. The meeting place was no longer available. Stephanie sighed. Then she had an idea. She called the model whose text she had just read. They could have their meeting here at the townhouse. Stephanie stood up as she started to talk. As she spoke to the woman on the phone, she glanced at the chair she had been sitting in. She smiled at
her mistake. It hadn't been a massage chair after all. There was a CPR doll lying on the chair and she had been sitting on it.

If only he had moved from the chair. Now it was too late! She was so incredibly heavy! Her weight was slowly crushing him to death. Much of the air in his lungs was forced out of immediately. Any remaining air was now being systematically squashed from him with absolutely no hope to replace it. Ricky's small diaphragm could never possibly lift this lady's full weight by even a fraction. The best he could do was force himself to resist being instantly crushed altogether. Maybe he could hang on long enough for her to finish her conversation and leave. The tall girl's ass covered him from just under his chin to just above his knees. He was helpless against the heavy weight of this tall woman. Ricky could not have made even a tiny sound if he had wanted to. All of his senses were dampened. He couldn't open his eyes, his head hurt. He could hear only his heart pounding the blood through his restricted vessels. His throat and indeed his entire torso burned from lack of oxygen. Ricky felt his ribs bending toward the breaking point. If not for soft chair seat beneath him, they would certainly have broken already. He could feel his eyes rolling back in his head. Ricky was starting to lose consciousness. He suddenly felt like his stomach was imploding. The waves of this sensation heightened as Ricky's body continued to be pressed even flatter under the full weight of this woman. This was it, he thought vaguely. His destiny was to be fatally crushed unknowingly by the house-sitter. And then without warning, he was able to breathe again. Not fully by any means and it was excruciatingly painful but he was able to breathe. He could also open his eyes. He could not register at first but the lady appeared to be gone. OMG, he thought! I hope she doesn't come back.

It had not occurred to Stephanie before but now she was thinking back
to when she had been talking with her potential new colleague back in the office. She had been sitting on a CPR doll. It had actually been a very pleasant sensation. She was curious about how that might feel on a real man. For that matter, what might it be like for the man, if he actually was that small? It would likely be terminal, she smiled at the
idea! What a feeling it would be killing a man without any effort whatsoever. She could simply sit and allow her significant weight to press relentlessly down onto his crushed and suffocating form. What would a man that size weigh, she wondered? Perhaps a hundred pounds! Likely less she decided! It would feel very hopeless having a woman more than 2 and half times your weight, just simply sit on you and slowly crush and suffocate the life from you. Stephanie wondered how long it might take for the man to
succumb to the pressure. She thought it would be kind of nice if he could last a few minutes at least! It might be a very pleasurable experience sitting on a little man as he writhed and squirmed in vain attempts to extricate himself from the crushing force. How powerful that would make her feel. The very life of the man would be at her discretion. She could decide to get off of him and let him live or prolong the act by periodically letting him recover and then resume the squashing onslaught by again seating herself on top of him. Perhaps her colleague would even care to join her. Together they could easily bring an end to the man's tortured existence!




=
15211111111111211112.title: Stephanie Towers pt. 1  by. DG

152111111111112111121.content:
Callie Remirez was a leggy brunette from Buffalo. Stephanie had been on a tour when they had met. As it turned out Callie was trying to find some introduction into the Amazon model community. She certainly had the requirements. Callie was just over 6’ 3. She had a build more voluptuous than athletic like Stephanie. She carried her 235 pounds flawlessly and her pretty face possessed a warm and intoxicating smile. She had so many questions that Stephanie asked finally if she would like to meet and discuss the prospects of working together. Stephanie offered to show Callie the ropes so to speak. Similar to how Amazon Amanda had shown Stephanie. Callie was now going meet Stephanie at the house where she was taking care of her friend’s cats and looking in on the house.

When Callie arrived, Ricky was still trapped in the house. He had been given no chance to escape without risk of being caught and so he had remained on the chair in the office where Stephanie had nearly crushed him. He was afraid to even move lest he be arrested and charged or worse. This was supposed to be his last job and now he was so close to getting away and yet so far. He listened as Stephanie invited Callie into the house. The two women strolled into the office still talking. Callie was already asking questions. She wanted to know everything. About giantess stuff, about height comparisons, wrestling, trampling, crushing, everything! Stephanie patiently explained the aspects of the various client specialties. She found Callie’s exuberance very refreshing. The young girl seemed to be genuinely curious about everything especially trampling and chest sitting. Callie had some trepidation about standing and sitting on people with all her weight. Stephanie explained that it was, after all, what the clients wanted and that it was also quite a lot of fun to crush a man underfoot or sit on them until they turned blue. Callie wondered how to do that exactly. How do you know when you should get off them, she wondered? Stephanie told her that after a while you just get to know when they have had enough. Sometimes though, it’s fun to pretend that you might have forgotten about them down there. They always panic so much when they think that! All that squirming and groaning is really quite a turn on. Callie wondered if there were clients who required even more intense treatments. Steph informed her that only rarely would a man request more pressure than she herself could deliver. “Have you ever doubled up on a guy with another Mistress?” Stephanie had a couple of times when she was starting out and when she told Callie about them, Callie wanted to know exactly how to ensure the full weight of both girls was on the client. “I will show you on this doll,” Stephanie said.


Stephanie got up from behind the desk and walked over the chair where Ricky was lying. She slid his head under the arm of the chair to center him on the cushion. Then she smiled at Callie, turned around and sat her full 275 pounds on Ricky’s helpless body. Again she was covering him from his knees to his chin. The weight of her body was so oppressive; he could barely take in any oxygen at all. Stephanie was explaining to Callie how she could sit on Stephanie’s lap. As Callie pressed her butt onto Stephanie’s thighs more than 500 pounds was now crushing down onto Ricky. The pressure was so intense that he could hear only his heart pounding and he could actually feel air being pressed out of his ears. He was certain he was going to implode. Callie was so excited. She was asking Stephanie what it felt like. Stephanie smiled and told Callie to try sitting on the doll. The two big ladies stood up momentarily. Ricky had no time to recover however because in an instant, Callie was perched on top of his oxygen deprived body. She was very excited. She enjoyed the sensation for almost a minute before asking Stephanie to sit on her lap. Once again more than 500 pounds was pressing Ricky to the office chair seat. This time, the slightly smaller ass of Callie concentrated the load even more but Ricky new, either way he would be dead in another minute or two. Less if they should start to bounce. He could hear the girls talking but couldn’t recognize what they were saying. He was very close to unconsciousness. It was several minutes before he dared crack open his eyes a little. He could see Stephanie smiling down at him. At least he was alive, for now!

1521111111111121111212.content:
I was on a coach trip round the worcestershire countryside and made
stop at harvington hall an old manor house which used to be owned by
a catholic family, this hall had many hiding places where the priests
used to hide during the reformation, as I entered the hall I noticed
a young lady wearing 6" stiletto heels a few places ahead of me in
the queue, as I knew that there was a hiding place by the fire place
near the outside entrance, I decided to be mischievous and hid in
this hole where I could see the peoples feet.
there were many passed by during the next hour but there was one that
I was looking for in her shiny black leather sandals and her log
thin bz heels.
Suddenly these exquisite heels appeared in front of me, I put my one
hand to the side to steady myself while with the other I clasped this
ladies exquisite heel, as she was stood still listening to the guide
she did not notice my hand holding the heel of her sandal, but then
she started to move, she tried to lift her heel but it met with
resistance from my hand as she got her heel free she was off balance
and stepped back, the whole of her weight was balanced on her tiny
steel spike right in the back of my hand.
I wa rushed off to the first aid room where my injured hand was
bandaged up and I continued my tour with my arm in a sling.
Later on in the tour I went on a boat trip at Stourport, and as we
got in the queue for the boat I realised that I was stood right
behind the same lady with her bz heeled sandals, as we walked up the
gangplank to the boat, the boat lurched and this lady again stumbled
backwards, this time it was my poor foot that fell victim to her
sharp steel bz heels. Oops, sorry, I always seem to be under your
feet, don't I?.
1521111111111121111212.title: hand crush

15211111111111211112121.content: The closest thing to a real heel was when this girl, Debbie, stepped on my fingers with her 'dress shoes' which had a 2" heel that was about 1.5" square at the bottom. I remember that the pressure she exerted on my fingers was a lot worse then what other girls who were heavier had exerted on my fingers with the wider heels they had. As most of us know, to get the force you divide the heel area into a square inch and multiply by the girl's weight. So if a girl weighs 125 lbs and has a 1" square heel, you get a maximum of 125 lbs on the hand her heel crushes. But if her heel is a spike and is only a quarter inch by a quarter inch, you are looking at 1600 lbs of pressure for only a 100 lb girl! Believe me, a 100 lb girl can exert more force with the tip of her spike heel then any car can with it's tire. I found out the hard way one day. As we got older, I started noticing that more and more girls at school would occasionally wear 'heels' as they called them at the time. Some were little more then 2" high while some of the more brave girls would wear heels as high as 4". All were the thin 'spike' type. Now, mind you, not all the girls wore them and what girls who did wear them did not wear them all the time. But, at least a few girls had spike heels on every day. Well, I didn't know these girls or live near them so I could only ogle them and follow them while enjoying the sounds of the heels clicking on the hard school hall floors. I got to see several girls step on things with these heels and remember picking up several of the things that they had stepped on and still retained their heel imprints. In fact, I had a small collection of things that had been 'spiked' as I used to call it, in my bedroom hidden in a box in my closet. Well, one day, while resting in my bedroom in the summer, I had my window open and could hear the girl next door and my friend Debbie talking. I was half dozing off and was noticing this odd scraping and occasional click tap sound. Initially I just laid there and dozed but all of a sudden I realized what I was hearing. It sounded an awful lot like one of the two girls was finally wearing high heels! I could not see their feet from my window and just waited hoping they would walk out a bit farther so I could see for sure. They never did so I was left wondering. As the day moved into the evening, my friend came over and we went outside to just hang out as teens like to do so as to get away from parents and family. We were sitting in this area where we, along with Debbie and Yvonne would many times meet us to talk and just goof off. I didn't know if the girls would show up tonight or not so my friend and I just sat there talking about girls, school and the usual crap young teens do. We were getting into some subject when I heard the voices of the girls and the usual giggling. I looked down the road to see Debbie and Yvonne walking down the road toward us. They both waved and kept on walking toward where I was. It was dark enough that they were getting hard to see. When they got closer I noticed something different. It took a moment but it finally clicked. They were both wearing heels! I knew by the distinctive 'clicking' sounds they made with each step. Also, it was obvious they were both wearing them because of the number of clicks. Too many for only one girl. Debbie was a 5'6" brunette of about 120 lbs while Yvonne was about 5'4 and 135 lbs. Both were attractive, but not knock outs. They were the kind who you didn't go all ga ga over, but who continued to look nice to you year after year. As they got closer I was finally able to see their feet clearly. Debbie had a nice pair of black pumps with 3" heels that had to be no thicker then a big framing nail. Yvonne had a pair of white pumps with 4" heels that were thicker then Debbie's heels, but still nice and thin. We talked for a little bit then went back into this little park like area in the woods where we usually hung out. Debbie liked to smoke back there since her parents would have killed her if they ever found out. This area was hidden from the road and a great place for us to let our hair down. I was mesmerized by the girl's new shoes.
15211111111111211112121.title: Debbie Hand Trample pt. 1

152111111111112111121211.content: I couldn't take my eyes off their feet. I was really getting turned on watching as Yvonne and Debbie sank their heels into the ground while talking with us. We had a small camp fire going and it offered enough light to see their feet, especially Yvonne's in those white pumps. I could now see debris stuck on both girl's shoes. They seemed to be oblivious to the things they crushed and mangled with those vicious heels. I knew I had to get my fingers stepped on by one or both of these girls. I made like I was fooling with the fire and squatted down. I was next to Yvonne and slid my hand toward her till I felt her foot. She had her back to me as she was talking to my friend and Debbie so I looked at her feet and realized she was rocking off her left heel every now and then. I moved my fingers to her left heel and waited till she rocked it off the ground. I didn't have to wait long. I seized my opportunity and slid my index finger under her thin heel. She put some pressure on her heel and I was amazed at how much pressure was on my finger. But, I figured this was only part of it since her other heel was sunk deep into the ground. She slid off my finger, then I watched as her heel sunk into the ground right next to my fingers. Bummer! This time her right heel raised and I slid my finger under it. Within a couple seconds, she shifted her weight to her right foot and I was left speechless. I figured the pressure would be about double what she had delivered with her left foot but I was unprepared for her full weight. I had all I could do to keep from making some kind of sound as she stood there. Although she was only on my finger for a few seconds, it felt longer. When she shifted her weight to her other foot, I pulled my throbbing finger our from under her heel. It hurt like hell but man what a turn on! As the pain subsided, I decided to see what Debbie could do with those black heels of hers. Again I did the thing with the fire while sitting next to Debbie's feet. She was to my left and I slid my left hand next to her foot feeling for the heel. Before I could find it, Debbie stepped to her side and right on the back of my hand with the ball of her foot. Caution, the following story contains car crush and trampling themes involving a minor, it is a fictional story created for your entertainment and should be taken as such.

One day, my sister and I had spent the afternoon playing hide and seek in the house and in the garden. She was a few years older than me but the fact that I was ten often played to my advantage as I had an edge in imagination when thinking of the best places to hide, and because of this I often won. We had played on and off for most of the afternoon and the daylight was fading like the countries bank account. Nevertheless it kept us out the way of our mum and aunt who had spent their time in a semi-successful attempt to fix the car. The car a ‘Hyundai Entourage 2007’ had been damaged in recent days as we had been forced to continually drive over a badly damaged road to get to our house. General poor maintenance, freeze-thaw effect from the weather, and vandals had resulted in a section of road with multiply dips, ditches, pot-holes and cracks. Having to drive over this had damaged the car so that it was now making a worrying rattling noise and even stalled by itself now and again (thankfully only at low speeds so it was still reasonably safe to drive short distances). There was no man of the house, so it fell down to my mother and aunt to try and fix the problems.

My sister was getting bored with playing with me, but I was still trying to entice her into one more game. Eventually after begging she agreed to play one last game, and told me to -
“Go and hide” and that she’ll try and find me soon.
Having thought about the car and seeing my mother and aunt work on it had given me the brilliant idea of hiding on the road behind the car. There were plenty of nooks and crannies that I could fit into, and giving the fact that they had abandoned their attempt to fix it, it seemed like the perfect place to hide. However it was not...

I had found a nice mould in the road to fit myself into, and had even covered myself with a think tartan blanket that had been left outside from a picnic we all had together at lunch. More than five minutes passed and I remained hidden. Despite it was now pretty dark and getting cold, I was pretty cosy and content knowing that my sister hadn’t found me yet. However within seconds of that thought, I heard voices coming out of the house. It was my mother, aunt and sister. I could hear them talking but they were still too far away for me to hear what they were saying. There were however getting closer to me, I was disappointed, my sister couldn’t find me so she had enlisted help to do so – I was seconds away from been discovered. I could hear two sets of high heels walking towards the car and another set of flat shoes behind them. They soon came into range of my listening.
“...for the moment at least, have to get someone professional to have a look.” My aunt’s voice commented.
“Hmm, it only has to get the kids to school in the morning, and then I can get it into the garage, are you sure it will get them that far – I wouldn’t want to breakdown half way there.” I heard my mum say with an edge of concern, this was brilliant – I still hadn’t been found.
“We can try it now, see if it’s driveable?” Added my aunt. I then heard her ask my sister where I was.
“Oh, he’s away hiding something, thinks I’m looking for him, can’t be bothered, he’ll be under the bed again.”
“Alright let’s try everyone into the car.”
I heard the trio climb into the car and seconds later the engine started. I could hear the unmistakable sound of the car driving slowly over pebbles, the sound was getting louder, and it was coming towards me. I suddenly remembered where I was and that nobody knew I was here but it was too late.
Slowly but surely I felt the back wheel of the car roll on to my stomach. I felt like my insides were being compressed like nothing I could have possibly imagined before. It rolled off a few seconds later; I knew what was coming next – the front wheel. I tried to braze myself for it, but as it rolled on to me I was totally unprepared. The weight was so much intense than the back wheel. I felt like the car was sitting directly on my spine, I felt like my sides were going to split open and that my internal organs were going to be reduced to mush, I felt like my eyes were going to pop out of their sockets. I couldn’t move, speak or even breathe. The front wheel rolled off and the car continued to reverse down the road. I couldn’t move for shock, knowing that a huge car that weighs nearly 6000 pounds filled with my family adding a few more hundred pounds to the weight (my aunt wasn’t the smallest woman), had just run over me. I was in pain, but to tell you the truth I loved it. I had been trampled by my sister a few times and I enjoy wrestling with her, but this was on an entirely different scale. I wanted to experience more, so much so that as I heard the car driving back up the drive I made no attempt to get up.

The front wheel passed over slower this time, followed later by the back wheel. I could hear a thumping sound with each pass, I could also hear that the car was still making a rattling sound. As the car reversed over me again, the rear wheel missed my stomach and run over my chest instead. I felt like my rib cage buckle under the weight and compress down, I honestly thought that my ribs were going to snap like twigs, but the rear wheel passed over. Now I was a bit scared as I had already experienced the weight of the front wheel on my stomach, on my chest it would no doubt crush me. For a brief second I was slightly relieved when I felt the car climb onto my stomach. Only for a brief second as the car had now stopped on top of me. The front wheel was parked on my stomach and I felt the car bounce a few times as the occupants got out of the car.
“Told you, it’s stalled again” I heard my mother say. I heard footsteps coming towards me, then I felt a different pain, a sharp pain between my ribs, as my aunt walked over me and towards the engine of the car, it was followed seconds later by another sharp pain as my mother’s high heel poked me again between the ribs. Then I felt a crushing sensation as my sister stepped on to my chest with her flat school shoes. I could hear my mother and aunt playing around with the car’s engine, all the while I had the car parked on me, and my sister standing on my chest. Just when I thought things couldn’t get any worse, she started to jump up and down on me forcing the air out of me with each bounce.
“This road is all bumpy” I heard her comment.
“I know it’s getting very bad”
My sister continued to stomp my chest with her heel and stamp her foot up and down. The seconds continued to pass while the car remained stationary. My legs had gone numb, I managed to run my fingers down the side of my body and towards my stomach. I could feel the tyre on top of me, I then felt the sides of my body, they were hot to the touch and my abdomen felt like the weight of the car had compressed it down to a few centimetres. I continued to struggle to breath, nearly a minute had passed before I heard footsteps coming towards me. The next thing I knew someone had stepped on my head with their heels, before climbing back into the car which increased its weight even more. As the car’s engine started my sister stepped off my chest and right on to my face. Thankfully it was only a few more seconds before the car rolled off my stomach and my sister got off my face.
I was relieved when my stomach reinflateted, I could breathe again and the feeling started to return to my legs. This was far more intensive that I had ever experienced before but I was enjoying being trampled and crushed by my mother, aunt and sister. I was disappointed that once the car was clear they gave up on attempting to fix it. They decided to go back indoors no doubt it was too cold for them all, but as they left each of them in turn stood hard on my face and chests before leaving me alone. This was a brilliant experience one I was determined to repeat....

A Day At The Office (any unauthorised readers please note: these
stories are fictional accounts. They do not refer to anyone living or
dead. Also, they are copywrite of Will c) Linda wasn’t looking forward
to the day ahead. As the manager of her own accounts firm, she was due
to spend the entire day interviewing girls for the job as her private
secretary. Quality was hard to come by these days, and Linda was
difficult to please at the best of times. At 32, Linda could be said
to have it all. Not only was she very successful in her career, but
she was very attractive, what her mother used to call ‘a real head
turner. Linda was about 5”, 8’ in height. She had long, shapely legs,
small firm buttocks, a trim waist, and small firm breasts. Linda’s
facial features were beautiful: large brown eyes, a slim aquiline
nose, large, full sensuous lips, all framed by long black straight
hair. However, Linda considered her best physical features to be her
hands and feet. Her hands were long and sensuous, with long fingers,
and long, wide nails. Her feet were largish, wide-ish across the ball
of the foot, narrowing to a perfectly rounded heel, with long toes,
and long, wide, smooth, perfectly shaped nails. Linda’s personality
was aggressive and dominant: she had to be the boss in all that she
did, even in her personal and working relationships. Today, with the
interviews in mind, Linda had dressed in a black two piece suit, white
blouse, black stockings, and black stiletto pumps. She wore her long
black hair tied back in a ponytail. She was aware of how imposing she
looked -and that was exactly how she wanted it. She wanted these
prospective employees to know that she was the boss. Seated in her
office, Linda began the interviews at 9am sharp. The first eight women
she interviewed were totally unsuitable for the job. By two in the
afternoon, she was angry and frustrated. As the last interviewee
entered her office, without even looking up from her desk Linda
snapped at the girl to take a seat. When she looked up, Linda had to
stop herself groaning with disappointment. The girl looked very young,
about 17, and had probably just left school. The girl had a plain
face, with shoulder length mousey brown hair. She was very slim,
except for her breasts, which were rather large for her frame. The
girl was dressed in a cheap pink two piece suit, with white tights and
pink flat-heeled shoes. From the application form on her desk, Linda
learned that the girl’s name was Mandy Simms. Looking up, Linda saw
that Mandy was very nervous. She sat in her seat, looking at Linda,
and blinking furiously. Linda was about to send her away, when Mandy
began to speak, in a timid, nervous voice. “P-please, M/s Hawthorn, I
know I don’t have much in the way of qualifications and things like
that, but, see, I really need this job." Linda continued to stare at
her, and Mandy took this as a signal to go on. “You see, I look after
my mum, because she is awfully ill and can’t look after herself. But I
won’t let them put her in a home. We can’t get by on unemployment
benefit, so I need to work to bring in enough money to keep two of

employment.” “Please, you have to understand. Because I have just left
school, I don’t have any experience. Jobs for girls my age only pay
about £70 a week; and that’s not enough to keep me and mum.” Despite
herself, Linda was beginning to enjoy this interview. She was enjoying

employment. Linda decided to see how far she would go to land the job.
She said to Mandy “It is a real problem that you don’t have any
experience of typing or shorthand. However, if I did take you on, to
compensate for your lack of experience I may end up asking you perform
certain other little tasks about the office, or personal tasks for me.
How do I know that you would be prepared to do these?” Sensing that
she might have a chance, Mandy blurted out, “I would be happy to do
anything you asked, M/s Hawthorn. Please give me a chance to show you
how good a worker I would be.” Linda said, “very well. You will spend
the rest of the afternoon with me here at the office, and I will give
you tasks to perform, and assess you on them. If you do well, you will
start work tomorrow morning.” Mandy face flushed with delight. Linda
brought her seat out from behind her desk and sat in front of Mandy.
Linda began, “Now suppose I have just had a phone call from a very
important client and have to rush out to see him. I have to look my

Mandy began to wipe harder, obviously pleased with the praise. Linda

Party Time

It was a very hot night, so as much as I hated going to parties the invitation from my neighbor to his pool party was just too good to pass up. I hatted this guy, he had no idea though. He was pretty shallow and churned through stunning girlfriends way faster than I could eat hot dinners. He was so detestable, tall, good looking, fit and worst of all rich.
He was also computer illiterate, and had purchased and amazing array of hardware based just on price I was sure. That lucky salesman must have seen him coming and made out like a bandit. Then as the resident local geek, he kept hitting me up to fix his many issues. I would have loved to fix the issue between his ears with a baseball bat. But he was generous, he was way too friendly, he was easy to hate but I could not bring myself to break away from his bloody charismatic grip.

But my mind wanders, back to the party. Dressed in very conservative long board shorts with an added pair of speedos underneath, and a thin t-shirt, wrapped in my biggest towel, with my best thongs on my feet, I was barely ready. I watched the party from behind my blinds, sweltering in 40 plus degree heat for the fifth straight day. I fantasised about that bloody huge pool of his and finally found the courage to start walking.

I slipped down the side gate and around the back to the pool. There were quite a few people in the pool but it was by no means crowded. There were girls there, most in bikinis. I was not good with girls, they were scary evil creatures and I was terrified of them. Years of bad painful experiences had ingrained a strong fear and a longing from a distance. Pitiful I was, just pitiful.

Entering through the side bushes I put my towel, T shirt and thongs in a safe, easy to get to spot, and slid as quietly as I could into the pool. The thermal shock was fantastic! I instantly cooled down and felt the relief of the cold water. As I relaxed I started to survey the pool area, and what a sight it was.

It was all the girls that hit me, they were all very pretty. They were all heights but they were mostly thin or athletic and all stylish, as was Max’s style. What a bastard he was.
One thing that was very apparent, was that most of the girls were wearing the most amazing high heels, almost all stilettos of some form or other. Some very, very sharp female footwear was in evidence. I feel an immediate interest from my groin and a sadness and longing in my heart. This party was going to truly suck. Oh well, cool down, stay out of sight and don’t attract attention.

That plan was not going to survive Max though. Mr Muscles and six pack walked out onto the patio with three supermodels hanging off his huge pecs. “Hey Sam” he bellowed at me waving one arm, sending one of the models flying. How could he cast off such a gorgeous creature, what a wasteful prick?

Oh shit, he was now storming in my direction with a trail of beauties clattering along behind him. I hadn’t thought it was possible for my heart to sink lower, how wrong was I. Feeling very self-conscious, I huddled in the corner of the pool and waited.

“hey dude, you came!! Great to see you!! Ladies, this is the computer wizard I was telling you about”. “Hey mate, Kimberly here has a funky laptop she needs help with, you up for it?” he just gushed at me. Kimberly smiled a ten thousand volt smile at me and said “I would be SO grateful Sammy, I need to sort out my email and my calendar and it is really hurting me, and I would SO love it if you could!!” My god I would have walked over hot coals for this red headed vision. From where my head was in the pool, she just towered above me, all I could make out were these incredible long, slender legs that seemed to go up for ever until they met a reasonable pair of boobs and a large mop of red hair. She looked three metres tall to me.

“Can we do it now?” she crooned down at me, now a twenty thousand volt smile hit me and I was very aware that my groin was out of control and set to embarrass me badly. I was now having a full on panic attack, breathing was difficult, talking impossible with my heart pounding in my head and the dizziness setting in. I just managed a grunt and reached up to pull myself out of the pool but I lacked the strength.

Max had the attention span of a goldfish, and had moved his attention on to a buxom blond currently trying to climb into his mouth. Kimberly had moved her attention to the display tonsil hocky Max and the blond had underway, so no one was watching me struggle as I clambered up the side of the pool and reached out to grab the brickwork.

As I reached for the edge of the pool surround Max and the blond bumped into Kimberly and she stumbled back. There was the most incredible pain from my hand as her sharp, metal stiletto heel stomped down into the back of my hand and smashed its way between the bones. I felt the bones of my hand move under the incredible pressure. She had stomped back and now just stood there with all her weight impaling my hand. On god it hurt.

Her heels were polished wooden platforms, I’d never seen anything like them before. They were beautiful, with a carved wooden sole that was over an inch thick and contoured down to a sharp point at the front. The sole was a rugged rubber with deep impressions that looked like an off road SUV tire. But the back tapered up to a very high heel, at least six inches. And the heel, the thin, razor sharp golden metal heel came out of the wood in a thin tube and stayed thin all the way down to the tip, which looked metal as well. And one of those amazing brutal metal heel tips was currently crushing a hole through my hand.
I could not scream, I was feeling a bit sick and struggling in the water. I was not going to drown, Kimberly had me nailed to the edge of the pool with a real nail.

I thought this was the worst pain I have ever felt, until she suddenly moved and twisted on her heel. I felt something give as her sexy heel ripped through the skin of my hand as she turned then stepped away. As she lifted her heel my hand lifted too and then let go as the heel ripped back out from my hand. Reflex action pulled my hand backwards in to the water then new pain, it was a salt water pool. I was gasping in pain as a confused and pissed off looking Kimberly looked down at her heel and then me.

Zero volts now, she looked a bit pouty. Very beautiful, but pouty. “Can you help me?” she asked sounding kind of sad now. I was calming down and had found my voice thankfully, but it had a bit of a hurt warble in it as I said “yes, sure, I would love to”. She had no idea what pain she had just caused.

I managed to pull myself out to the pool with one arm, my right hand was throbbing with pain and bleeding, but I managed it. I grabbed my T shirt and rapped it around my hand to contain the bleeding and pulled my towel over my shoulders. I could found my left thong but not my right. I abandoned it and rushed after Kimberly in bare feet. As we went inside I realised that in heels she was barely taller than me, and was actually quite petite. She was small but very well proportioned. She was lovely, and my lousy groin was betraying me again.

I followed her into Max’s huge study, it was the size of my whole dam unit. She was quiet, so I summoned up courage from somewhere and said “um, are you ok Kimberly? You look sad”. Bang! I was hit in the face with another twenty thousand volts. When this girl smiled the planet lit up.

“Oh aren’t you sweet!!” she said and just looked at me. I couldn’t take the intensity of her gauze. I looked down and mumbled “ah, um, er, your laptop?” heart now racing again, trying desperately to not pass out, my panic attack was back with a vengeance.

She didn’t move for at least half a minute, she just stood there, a vision in a fire engine red bikini and flaming red hair. The more she studied me, the more I started shaking. I was going to come apart at the seams. My face was now fire engine red.





Story of: heelcushion
from the other forum.

Great story
1542.title: Other story: party time

15421.content:
“Hey!! Are you bleeding?” she said, and reached for my hand as I pulled it away. “You are!! Let me see” and she grabbed my arm and pulled it. I could not resist her as she lifted my arm, and slowly unwrapped my hand. Suddenly she took off to the bathroom with my arm, and therefore me in tow.

“What happened?” she asked, but I could only grunt. I was shaking again, it was a tough choice what the cause was. Blood loss, fear, hyperventilation … all three, take your pick.
She was efficient and quick, she had the first aid kit out, she had my hand under cold water and was carefully examining my wound. Her beautiful eyes were wide looking at the wound and at me, then I saw the lightbulb go off. She looked at the wound, then reached down and took off her shoe.

She examined the heel, which was splattered with blood, my blood. I was shocked, there was a small scrap of skin hanging off the sharp edge of the heel. She drew in a breath, and looked at me very thoughtful.

“Was that me, did I get your hand with my heel?” she said softly. “That must have seriously hurt” she continued, “why didn’t you say something?” she asked. “I am so, so sorry you poor thing, I felt something but didn’t realise. Oh you poor thing, I am so sorry”. She look really sad.

“It’s ok, it was my fault, I’m sorry” I finally got some words out.

“What!!?!?” she exclaimed, “I smash my stiletto heel through your poor hand and You say sorry to me?”. “I think this needs a trip to the hospital” she said. “no, please!!” I rasped out. “It has got to be hurting right? There is no telling what damage I have done to you” she said. She put gauze on the wound and wrapped it in a bandage. “No, hospital, now!!” she said and walked off dragging me behind her.

She suddenly turned and stepped over to a table and picked up a bag. She did not realise that the rough rubber sole of her awesome platform shoe was now crushing my toes. With that wooden platform she would not feel anything she stood on, I was in love with them.
She opened the bag and pulled out what looked like a small red rag. She stretched it out and pulled it on, it was an amazing tight red mini dress and as she pulled it on. She looked fantastic. She had keys and moved to the door with a loud clacking on the hardwood floor. I stumbled and fell into the wall.

“Woah there, lets take it easy” she said as she grabbed me around the waist and helped me out the door. We walked out the gate, her warm body holding me tight, the sweet smell of her perfume intoxicating me. She pressed the remote, we were beside a very large SUV. She opened the passenger door and helped me in. I did not feel very well.

She walked around the other side and climbed in, it was a very expensive looking Range Rover. The leather of the seats and trim still smelt new. I was in awe of her as she drove it like a sports car, in six inch heels. I was distracted by the sight of her legs, and the movement of them on the pedals. She kept glancing at me with an unreadable expression.
I don’t know how long the ride took, but we eventually arrived at some hospital somewhere. I was strangely a bit out of it. She was proving quite strong and fit as she dragged me out of the car and helped me into the emergency room.

I heard her start talking to a receptionist or nurse or something as I slowly passed out.
I felt like I was in a dream as I slowly came around, then woke with a start. I was in a bed, and Kimberly was holding onto my undamaged hand, she smiled at me and gave my hand a squeeze.

Just then a very attractive middle aged woman in a white coat came in, she said “hi I’m Dr Green I’ll be looking after you today, what do we have going on here?”.

Kimberly looked at me and I could not speak or make eye contact, having problems breathing again and feeling very dizzy.

“We were out at a party and I’m afraid I stood on his hand with my stiletto heel, I didn’t even notice, it just smashed a hole in his hand!”. She explained, then went on to describe me passing out and being unable to talk.

The Dr gently unwrapped my hand, and asked Kimberly for her shoe. Kimberly took it off and I again had a good look at that amazing long sharp heel.

“These are beautiful, and that heel is just amazing. I love them!” the Dr exclaimed. “Where did you get them?” she asked. As she said it the Dr was comparing the hole in my hand with the heel tip. “That clearly did the damage all right, and you didn’t feel a thing?” she asked. “No I just stepped on it, I may have twisted the heel a bit, I remember feeling something strange but I was distracted” said Kimberly.

The Dr looked at me, lifting my chin to look me in the eye. “I’ll bet you felt it right? How did that feel? Did you feel a twist?” she asked. She had an intense look on her face. I just nodded.

“He doesn’t say much does he?, is he always like this?” the Dr asked Kimberly as she went over to a trolley and filled a syringe. “No, he has only mumbled a few words at me since we met an hour ago”. Kimberly replied folding her arms and frowning at me. Now I felt like I wanted to die, my life really was not worth living.
